statements: DELETE FROM shipping_costs WHERE distance = 100 AND weight > 50
DELETE FROM shipping_costs WHERE distance = 100 AND weight = 50 AND delivery_speed = 'standard';
DELETE FROM shipping_costs WHERE weight = 75 AND distance > 200;
DELETE FROM ShippingCosts WHERE distance > 100 AND weight < 10;
DELETE FROM shipping_costs WHERE distance > 100 AND weight <= 10
DELETE FROM distance_cost_rates WHERE id = 3 AND cost_per_unit_distance = 5.75
DELETE FROM TransportationCompany WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
